Welcome to the Fishing Planet’s Haunted Fleet Drops Campaign!
Get your viewers hooked on thrills and chills with Fishing Planet’s Haunted Fleet Twitch Drops Campaign! Players can earn exclusive rewards just by watching your Fishing Planet streams,  including Credits, BaitCoins, XP boosts, and limited-time Halloween baits and lures to help them on their ghostly quest through the Chronicles of the Haunted Fleet Halloween Event. Stream under the Fishing Planet tag and let your community reel in their haunted treasures while joining the Halloween fun!

rewards.description: 🌘 Return of Reckoning – Daemon Moon: Decaying 2025 Drops | October 24 to November 3 🌘  As the Daemon Moon rises once more, the world trembles beneath its sickly glow. Morrslieb rots in the heavens, its foul light seeping into the mortal realm. The veil between worlds frays, and corruption spreads like a plague across the land.  From the desolate wastes of Chaos to the tainted marshes of Norsca, daemons and madmen alike heed the call of decay. The servants of Nurgle rejoice as pestilence and ruin claim the living, while the desperate stand firm—blades drawn and faith tested against inevitable rot.  From 10:00 AM UTC on October 24 to 10:00 AM UTC on November 3, take part in the Daemon Moon: Decaying celebration on Twitch. Watch six total hours of Return of Reckoning across any Drops-enabled stream to claim up to seven exclusive rewards, each forged in defiance of corruption itself.  When the moon decays, only the resolute endure. Watch. Resist. Survive.
rewards.name: Daemon Moon 2025

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online-November

rewards.description:
Watch and Stream The Outlast Trials to celebrate our first ever Twitch Drop campaign in honor of the launch of our new Experimental Therapy and PvP Game Mode: Invasion! 

This Halloween you'll not only be able to test your resilience in the Geister Limited-Time Event, but you'll be able to jump into Invasion and choose to play as a Reagent completing Trials, or an Imposter sabotaging them. You can play solo or in groups of up to 4 players!
